isis.stitle: AIR COMPRESSOR: BENDIX TU-FLO 550 AND TU-FLO 750 - MAINTENANCE - DRY ELEMENT PLEATED PAPER STRAINER

svcproc.title: DRY ELEMENT PLEATED PAPER STRAINER
svcproc.para:
Every two months, 800 operating hours, or 20,000 miles (32,180 km) (whichever occurs first),
loosen the spring clip from the unhinged side of the mounting baffle and open the cover. Replace the pleated paper filter and secure the cleaned cover, making sure the filter is in position. Be sure to replace the air strainer gasket if the entire air strainer is removed from the compressor intake.
